  • Processor: tested on SteamDeck and linux live ubuntu on i5 7th gen
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: (optional not mandatory) for anaglyph experience You need cyan/magenta glasses - You can find them on amazon for few bucks (this is the first game I release with support for Anaglyph and I plan to make more, so if You like things popping out of the screen and deep field of view from Anaglyph 3D technology consider buying Anaglyph glasses in plastic for the best experience for about 2-3 dollars)
